group_1.textLeft: I see.
You've been…wracking your brain@about your preferences, then?
| So you were examining@different people's legs earlier? |

group_1.textRight: Yeah… I thought it might give us an idea@about what kinds of legs she likes.

group_1.textLeft: | Hinano told me |
| that doing something like that@will get the police to question you. |
I would recommend against doing anything
that could lead to those close to you@being questioned by law enforcement.

group_1.textRight: What do you think we should do@about Miyuri's leg fetish…?

group_1.textLeft: …That is hardly a question to ask@an elementary schooler, you know.
…*Sigh*
(I've seen Miyuri Yukari's obsession with legs@on several occasions)
(while we were in the Magius…)
(Therefore, I know how much she struggles with it.)
(She may be an enemy now,@but she was once one of the Feathers.)
(The other Magius and I certainly caused her@a lot of trouble.)
(I sincerely doubt that fixing her problems@will be enough to make up for that.)
(However…)
…Very well.
I cannot guarantee that I can offer a solution,@but I can at least lend an ear.
Sakurako has been looking quite curious@for a while now…
Who do you think I am?
…Now then, Miyuri Yukari.@Tell me more about what's going on.
So you commented on others' legs without their@permission and made them uncomfortable.
…I'm not surprised that they disliked that.

group_1.textRight: I don'tー I don't have any excuses…
After thatー After that, I tried a bunch of training@methods, but nothing seemed to work…
Just when I was about to get rid of my collection@to make myself stop liking what I like,
I ran into Rui, and here we are.

group_1.textLeft: I think there was a bit of an issue with the kind of@"training" you were attempting to do…
It comes from the word "fetishism".
In this case…it means a specific attraction to legs.
The degree and type of preference varies@from person to person, so it's hard to generalize.

group_1.textRight: …Yeah. Some people are only mildly into it.
And some, like Miyuri, are…more intense…

group_1.textLeft: | I read in the database |
| that people with excessive tastes are called@"perverts". |
…That was rather impolite.@I apologize on Sakurako's behalf.
You may be a little different from others, though.
Well, I suppose everyone has their thing.
Precisely, Sakurako.
…At any rate, why do you want to get rid of your@preference?
Let's start by figuring out
what got you into legs in the first place.
Such tastes generally start somewhere.@Indeed, even stories say as much.
From there, perhaps we can figure out a solution.
